definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

pinyin: shou3 ci4 gong1 kai1 zhao1 gu3
shou3 ci4 zhu4 shi4 shi2 jian1

sentences.english: And the Northwest Passage in the Arctic became ice-free for the first time in living memory.
sentences.chinese: 在当今人们的记中，北极西北航道首次成为无冰航道。

sentences.english: The type of surgery is the first to be conducted on an infant.
sentences.chinese: 这是首次在初生婴儿身上进行的同类型手术。

sentences.english: Muammar al-Qaddafi, making his first appearance despite 40 years in power.
sentences.chinese: 这也是卡扎菲执政40年来首次参加联大会议。

sentences.english: Contemplated share offerings, both initial public offerings and straightforward share issuances , are being put back on the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 首次公开募股等各种预期中的股票发行也已经搁置。

sentences.english: The design of the planetary indexing cam mechanism is put forward for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次提出了一种行星分度凸轮机构的设计构想。

sentences.english: It was the first gold won by a swimmer in a Speedo suit in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 这是身着Speedo泳衣的运动员首次在罗马夺金。

sentences.english: This is the first study to ever report such an association.
sentences.chinese: 这是迄今为止首次报道存在这种相关性。

sentences.english: At the same time, Li Shizhen Medicine Innovation Award is presented at first.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，李时珍医药创新奖也在会上首次颁发。

sentences.english: I recall Duan Jin's first visit to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 我回想起段津首次来澳大利亚访问的情景。

sentences.english: Tracy: She took her first beauty title when she's 21.
sentences.chinese: 她在21岁的时候首次摘取了“选美皇后”头衔。

sentences.english: Using in situ end labelling, the authors demonstrated for the first time that this change belonged to apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 经原位末端标记，首次证明本病的这种病变属于凋亡。

sentences.english: These were the first spermicides on condoms.18
sentences.chinese: 并且在避孕套中首次用了杀精药。

sentences.english: It is the first cold spring since 2000.
sentences.chinese: 2000年以来，杭州首次遭遇倒春寒。

sentences.english: The apomixes approach of undiffused gamete is the first report.
sentences.chinese: 后一种单性生殖发育方式为首次报道。

sentences.english: This is the first evidence of snakes eating dinosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 这是首次发现的蛇捕食恐龙的证据。

sentences.english: He decided to debut with several other violinists.
sentences.chinese: 他决定与其他几名小提琴手一起首次登台演出。

definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to take the lead/to show initiative
separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
